Package org.apache.manifoldcf.core.system

Class Summary
Logging This class furnishes the logging environment for the JSKW application.
ManifoldCF  
ManifoldCF.DatabaseConnectionReleaseThread The thread that actually releases database connections
ManifoldCF.DatabaseShutdown Class that cleans up database handles on exit
ManifoldCF.FileTrack Class that tracks files that need to be cleaned up on exit
ManifoldCF.ShutdownThread Finisher thread, to be registered with the runtime
ManifoldCFConfiguration This class represents the configuration data read from the main ManifoldCF configuration XML file.
ManifoldCFResourceLoader An instance of this class is capable of minting URLClassLoader objects on demand, for the purpose of loading plugins.
